summary: Makes three skills made by Elysees only be obtainable by reading their respective skill books.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][u][b]Description[/b][/u][/size]

Three of the skills made by Elysees are no longer automatically added on first load. They can now only be learned through skill books.

[list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65952]Rapid Slash[/url]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65952]Stinger[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76361]Tempest[/url]﻿
[/list]
You can choose to apply all skill books at once, or just strictly one. [b]Do not enable more than one .esp file or your game will asplode.[/b]

But of course, this mod will be kinda pointless if your character has the said skills already. If so, then you might want to utilize [i]player.removeskill[/i]


[size=4][u][b]Requirements[/b][/u][/size]
(Requirements apply individually if you choose to have only one.)

[list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65952]Rapid Slash[/url]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65952]Stinger[/url]﻿
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76361]Tempest[/url]﻿
[/list]

[size=4][u][b]In-game Location[/b][/u][/size]
The skill book(s) can be found in the [b]Jorrvaskr Living Quarters[/b] (the Companions' base) in Whiterun, on a shelf in Kodlak Whitemane's room.


[size=4][u][b]Load Order[/b][/u][/size]
Just put this mod's .esp files below elysees' skill .esp files.


[size=4][u][b]Conflicts[/b][/u][/size]
I'm no expert (yet) at seeing mod conflicts, but by looking at TES5Edit I'm sure it will only conflict with mods that override the normal values of the cell WhiterunJorrvaskrBasement [0007947A]
Meaning, you pretty much don't have to worry about anything. (Please tell me if there's anything though)


[size=4][u][b]Credits[/b][/u][/size]

[list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1034867]elysees[/url]﻿ for the awesome skill mods
[*]Bethesda for the game. [i][size=1](durr)[/size][/i]
[/list]
author: AzureWind13
